text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki mujhase usakee manaahee kee gaee hai ki main khuda ko chhodakar un maaboodon kee ibaadat karun jin ko tum pooja karate ho (ye bhee) kah do ki mai to tumhaaree (naaphasaanee) khvaahish par chalane ka nahin (varana) phir to mai gumaraah ho jaaooaiga aur hidaayat yaaphata logon mein na rahoonga
